N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2408.4 - Exclusion of income of parent or spouse

State Regulations

In calculating the amount of an award for applicants who
are not financially independent of their parents, the income of a parent and
spouse shall be entirely excluded from consideration if, prior to January 1st
preceding the academic year for which an application is made: (a) the parent or spouse was
deceased; (b) the applicant and
spouse were divorced or separated; and
(c) the parents of the applicant were
divorced or separated, in which case the income of the parent having custody or
with whom the applicant resides shall be included and any payments made for the
support of the applicant by the parent not having custody or with whom the
applicant does not reside shall be included. Notes
